name: 250 Mannin no Kanken: Wii de Tokoton Kanji Nou
overview: 250 Mannin no Kanken: Wii de Tokoton Kanji Nou is official educational Han exam software designed to improve users' Kanji skills and prepare for the Kanji/Han. It includes a big data base of different words and has multiple modes including learning, dictionary, quiz, and even writing practice.
